name: Chicken
description: The Chicken is a loyal companion, or she would be if her brain weren't the size of a pea. She'll follow you around and help you grow in your skills a little bit more quickly. She has a natural affinity for Culinary Arts, on account of tasting so good.

name: Scorpion
description: The Scorpion is a powerful companion, or he would be if he weren't 5 inches long. He'll follow you around and help you improve your skills more quickly. He has a natural talent in Knifesmanship because he has a sharp knife attached to his rear.

name: Wasp
description: The Wasp is a spiteful companion. He'll help you improve in your skills more quickly and has a natural talent for Fishing. He got it from his mother, who was a fat queen and never did anything but eat and sleep.

name: Snake
description: The Snake is a slippery companion. She'll help you improve in your skills exceptionally quickly. Her natural talent is in Deftness, as her whole body is one long muscle.

name: Fairy
description: The Fairy is a friendly companion. He's not afraid to let you know when you need to listen. His advice will help you improve in your skills exceptionally quickly. He is a natural at flying, which you are unable to do, but he's also good at Hammermanship because his father was a hammerman.

name: Raven
description: The Raven is an aloof companion. She's exceptionally wise, and her wisdom will ensure you grow in your skills exceptionally quickly. She is a natural hunter and will improve in that skill faster than any other.

name: Minotaur
description: The Minotaur is a large companion. He used to be a regular weightlifter until the accident. His wisdom from years of weightlifting will help you improve in your skills extremely quickly. He's a natural at Strength and will teach you to lift with your legs, not with your back.

name: Ghost
description: The Ghost is a dead companion. He used to be alive--before he died. His past life experiences will enable you to grow in your skills extremely quickly. He was a natural at Leatherworking before his untimely demise and will help you learn that skill at a faster rate.

name: Snow Man
description: The Snow Man is a frosty companion. He never melts thanks to his years of experience in being cool. He will help you grow in your skills extremely quickly. He is a natural archer and will help you learn Archery at an improved rate.

name: Scarab
Description: The scarab is a shiny companion. His hard outer shell makes it hard to be friends with him, but he'll help you grow in your skills a little more quickly. He has a natural affinity for Woodworking, as it's his favorite food.

name: Frog
description: The frog is a slimy companion. He loves to eat bugs and teach people about things from the well where he lives. He'll help your skills grow a little bit more quickly. He has a natural affinity for Mining, though no one is quite sure why.

name: Falcon
description: The Falcon is a feathery companion. As a trained flying bird, he'll help you grow in your skills exceptionally quickly. He has a natural gift for Smithing, in part thanks to his excellent eyesight.

name: Tetropus
description: The Tetropus is a quadrupedal companion. He'll help you learn exceptionally more quickly with his four arms. He has a natural ability for wielding axes, which came from many, many mistakes using axes. He wasn't always a tetropus...

name: Nail Boy
description: Nail Boy is a huggable companion. The smartest of all the pets in Quepland, Nail Boy knows how to help you improve your skills extremely quickly. He has a natural affinity for Woodcutting thanks to his ability to hammer himself to any tree he's chopping.

name: Dragon
description: The dragon is a beastly companion. The largest and most powerful pet you can own. He'll help you grow extremely quickly. He has a natural talent for Swordsmanship because of all the swordsmen he's eaten.
